parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Valid values: 1 to 50.

parameters.name: IpVersion
parameters.description:
The IP version of the asset that is protected by Cloud Firewall. Valid values:

*   **4**: IPv4 (default)
*   **6**: IPv6

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese (default)
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: MemberUid
parameters.description: The UID of the member that is added to Cloud Firewall.

parameters.name: NewResourceTag
parameters.description:
The time when the asset was added. Valid values:

*   **discovered in 1 hour**: within one hour.
*   **discovered in 1 day**: within one day.
*   **discovered in 7 days**: within seven days.

parameters.name: OutStatistic
parameters.description: Whether to query external traffic information.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 50.

parameters.name: RegionNo
parameters.description:
The region ID of your Cloud Firewall.

> For more information about the regions, see [Supported regions](~~195657~~).

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the asset. Valid values:

*   **BastionHostEgressIP**: the egress IP address of a bastion host
*   **BastionHostIngressIP**: the ingress IP address of a bastion host
*   **EcsEIP**: the elastic IP address (EIP) of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance
*   **EcsPublicIP**: the public IP address of an ECS instance
*   **EIP**: the EIP
*   **EniEIP**: the EIP of an elastic network interface (ENI)
*   **NatEIP**: the EIP of a NAT gateway
*   **SlbEIP**: the EIP of a Server Load Balancer (SLB) instance or a Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance
*   **SlbPublicIP**: the public IP address of an SLB instance or a CLB instance
*   **NatPublicIP**: the public IP address of a NAT gateway
*   **HAVIP**: the high-availability virtual IP address (HAVIP)

parameters.name: SearchItem
parameters.description: The instance ID or IP address of the asset.

parameters.name: SgStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the security group policy. Valid values:

*   **pass**: delivered
*   **block**: undelivered
*   **unsupport**: unsupported

> If you do not specify this parameter, the assets on which security group policies in all states take effect are queried.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the firewall. Valid values:

*   **open**: The firewall is enabled.
*   **opening**: The firewall is being enabled.
*   **closed**: The firewall is disabled.
*   **closing**: The firewall is being disabled.

> If you do not specify this parameter, the assets that are configured for firewalls in all states are queried.

parameters.name: UserType
parameters.description:
The edition of Cloud Firewall. Valid values:

*   **buy**: a paid edition (default)
*   **free**: Free Edition
